title: Bristow VA Photographer | First Communion
content: I met with this sweet and beautiful girl for her First Communion Portraits in Bristow, Virginia.  We were so fortunate to have a beautiful spring night to work with. I love Milestone Sessions like this to capture this time in the lives of our children, celebrating these special moments.  I offer Child Mini Sessions on weekday evenings April to October. Here are a few of my favorites from our session!
source: Let The Light In Photography by Wendy Atkinson
